price: Watasema: Kwani! Ametujia mwonyaji, lakini tulimkadhibisha, na tukasema: Mwenyezi Mungu hakuteremsha chochote. Nyinyi hamumo ila katika upotovu mkubwa!
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلَىٰ قَدۡ جَآءَنَا نَذِيرٞ فَكَذَّبۡنَا وَقُلۡنَا مَا نَزَّلَ ٱللَّهُ مِن شَيۡءٍ إِنۡ أَنتُمۡ إِلَّا فِي ضَلَٰلٖ كَبِيرٖ
footnotes: Na wao watajibu: Ametujia mwonyaji, lakini sisi tulimkanusha tukamwambia mwongo, na tukasema: Mwenyezi Mungu hakukuteremshia chochote wewe wala Mitume wenginewe. Nyinyi mnao dai Utume si chochote ila ni watu walio potoka, na mko mbali na haki.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qālū balā qad jāanā nadhīrun fakadhabnā waqul'nā mā nazzala al-lahu min shayin in antum illā fī ḍalālin kabīrin
